-#ifndef RUST_EXCHANGE_ALLOC_H
-#define RUST_EXCHANGE_ALLOC_H
-
-#include <stddef.h>
-#include <stdint.h>
-
-class rust_exchange_alloc {
- public:

-    void *realloc(void *mem, size_t size);
-    void free(void *mem);
-};
